Name: Hours of operation of certain parks.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the hours of operation of certain parks.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Parks and Recreation

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1. Chapter 1 of tile 18 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding new section 18-110.1 to read as follows:
	§18-110.1 Hours of operation of parks. Notwithstanding the provisions of any other law or rule to the contrary, persons may at all times enter and use any park within the jurisdiction of the commissioner that is located within a zoning district classified as a commercial or manufacturing district pursuant to the New York city zoning resolution or is bordered solely by such zoning districts.
	§2. This local law shall take effect on March 1, 2012, except that the commissioner of parks and recreation shall take such actions as are necessary for its implementation, including the promulgation of rules, prior to such effective date.

JH
LS 2975
11/23/11
